items.name: Redchurch Deck Chair Pale Ale
items.desc:
PROMOTION - 2 CASES OF 24 FOR £50
USE DECKCHAIR2 AT CHECKOUT
Lockdown was an uncertain time for us all. Boredom was kicking in, the kids were driving us nuts, the baking wasn’t fun anymore and we had no idea what to do with the 700 rolls of toilet paper in the garage. However, as a nation we were all spending more time in the garden, enjoying the odd tipple and barbequing to our heart’s content. At Redchurch our talented brewers thought long and hard about what they could do to deliver a bit of escapism with a special beer for these socially distanced times. Deck Chair was born!
A Pale Ale at heart designed for reclined drinking, we combined the flavour and aroma of orange blossom with a punchy pale ale to give a fruity and aromatic nectar that reminded us that the summer was not lost, and we wouldn’t go down without a pint…. a lockdown pick-me-up when we needed it most.

items.name: Redchurch Great Eastern IPA
items.desc:
Just like the East London street after which it’s named, this beer packs in A LOT! A beer for the IPA connoisseur known for its big punchy flavours. Packed full of American hops that give a strong orange and citrus fruit flavour coupled with a balanced bitterness. Hints of grapefruit complete the taste sensation.

items.name: Redchurch Herbal Lemody
items.desc:
What do you get when you hand the reigns over to the brewers? Some unusual and wonderful beers that split opinion and always surprise.
What is a Grisette I hear you say? It’s a refreshing, low alcohol beer with origins in the Hainaut province of Belgium. Grisettes are crisp, medium/light-bodied, citrusy beers—brewed to be endlessly approachable. Just like the lovely brewers here at Redchurch.
When life gives us lemons we all need a bit of Herbal Lemody!
Hazy, dry and packed full of clean bursts of honeydew melon and soft lemon and lime, with a hint of herbal clove and black pepper spice. This is a beer best served ICE COLD. Refreshing and warming in combination, perfect for cool nights in or hot days out.

items.name: Redchurch Hoxton Stout
items.desc:
Our core range wouldn’t be complete without a beautiful stout. Born out of London the stout has been a staple beer in the drinking culture of this fantastic city and our Hoxton Stout doesn’t hold back when leaving its footprint on the great stouts that came before it.
With aromas of toasted bread, coffee and chocolate followed by a clear taste of punchy American hops gives you a fresh, almost fruity flavour with a pleasant kick of bitterness to finish. Indulge in the darkness! And at only 5% there Is no need to be afraid of the dark.

items.name: Redchurch Lager: WBA 2019 Gold Award Winner
items.desc:
Our flagship beer & all-round crowd-pleaser.
GOLD
World Beer Awards 2019
FINALIST
Imbibe Lager Challenge 2018
Redchurch Lager was first brewed in an apartment on Redchurch Street, London in 2011 and remains our flagship beer, guaranteed to please the palate of every lager enthusiast. This beer is brewed with a clear goal in mind; to sway you from those ‘safe’ lagers we all gravitate towards down the local. So why Redchurch Lager? We care for the process, meaning we don’t rush a thing. Redchurch Lager is less carbonated, packs more flavour and is as fresh as a crisp British morning. We believe so much in our lager that we don’t inflate our prices meaning our beers are competitive to those you find in the supermarket. Give it a go!
Characteristic hints of British malt with a grassy aroma. German and American hops complement each other and work with the sweetness of the malt base to provide a refreshing, clean and exceptionally well-balanced beer.

items.name: Redchurch Paradise IPA
items.desc:
Brewed with you in mind, this session IPA is there for those moments you want an all-day drinking beer or perhaps a beer to enjoy at lunchtime before heading back to the office. The name stems from Paradise Row in Bethnal Green which boasts a rich 340-year history and today is a social hub for those calling East London home. A cosmopolitan oasis that creates a little piece of East London Paradise….and that’s why we love it!
The moderate alcohol content is supported by a strong malt base with added oats for a fuller body. The bouquet is explosive with zesty fresh lime, tropical fruits and citrus making this beer fresh, easy-drinking and complex in equal measure.

items.name: Redchurch Shoreditch Blonde
items.desc:
It’s time to bring some Belgian inspired beer to the hipster hub of East London and beyond. This is unlike no other beer that you would have tasted by a British brewery. An individual within its class…a standout. So very Shoreditch. A fantastic beer for those looking to expand their beer palate. If you are partial to white wine this could be the beer for you. Pairs great with seafood dishes, cheese boards and a nice bit of crusty bread…we like grabbing a few of these for a day spent on the picnic blanket!
Saison yeast is the star of the show and pairs with European hops to give a fruit and banana aroma. Bitter but fruity, Extra pale malt and wheat malt give a sweetness and full body.

items.name: Redchurch Stratford Pilsner
items.desc:
Stratford Pilsner is the lighter, hoppier and slightly more bitter little brother to our award winning Redchurch Lager.
Perfect for those looking for a little more character in their beer but might not be quite ready to take on the big dogs (we’re looking at you, Great Eastern IPA). If you’re after a clean, crisp drinking experience then look no further!
The traditional German malt base provides a sweet biscuity flavour profile accompanied by the combination of German and British hops to give this classic pilsner a modern British twist. Clean, crisp and refreshing.
